text: Sapa Arena is a sports venue in Vetlanda in Sweden. It is the home of Vetlanda BK.http://www.svenskafans.com/bandy/vetlanda/Vetlanda-imponerade-i- invigningsmatchen-415588.aspx It was opened in 2011.http://www.svenskafans.com/bandy/vetlanda/Vetlanda-imponerade-i- invigningsmatchen-415588.aspx Sapa Arena holds 2,000 people.http://www.rusbandy.ru/stadium/108/ It hosted Division B of the 2013 Bandy World Championship. ==References== Category:Bandy venues in Sweden Category:Sport in Vetlanda
title: Sapa Arena
